item.description:
***JULY's Meetup is on MONDAY, instead of Tuesday***

The groundbreaking movie  The Secret revealed that Law Of Attraction is the SECRET to get more of what you want. However, we're realizing that  deliberately using Law of Attraction is NOT enough.

What is the OTHER Secret?
Hint! The parts of yourself you only see through your positive & negative reactions.

Carol Kammen, special guest from CA, Founder of Pathways Institute & a thoughtleader in authentic & conscious living, will share with you in this experiential event

- WHY the stuff that you reject in yourself & others is the OTHER Secret &

- HOW you can embrace, reclaim & transform these disowned “qualities” to empower you to more fully attract what you want

If you don't learn how to shine a light on these negative stuff, they'll  stick around...  unconsciously having power & influence over you!  Learn to accept them & they will bring you the keys to success.

******************************************************

About Carole Kammen:
  http://www.pathwaysinstitute.com

Carol Kammen, from CA, is the Founder & Principal of Pathways Institute & Pathways Business Institute. Both Pathways companies are dedicated to the exploration of human consciousness leading to personal, professional & spiritual wisdom, skills & fulfillment. Over 34,000 people have participated in Pathways programs unlocking the passion, & potential that lies within them, their families & teams to ignite & create success.

Carole has a unique ability to couple esoteric & philosophical wisdom with the latest developments in neuroscience & adult learning. She brings this unusual blend to the general public & traditional corporate environments in highly skillful & experiential ways, making her one of the leading talents in this arena. She feels extremely fortunate to have worked directly with  Joseph Campbell, who coined "follow your bliss" & other luminaries in the personal development arena. 

Carole's clients include Fortune 500 global companies, non-profits, governmental agencies & start-up companies including American Express, Charles Schwab, Massachusetts General Hospital, Fidelity Investments, Merrill Lynch, Akamai Technologies, Visa, Lucasfilm, Ltd., Pixar, & the California Department of Transportation.

Check out the  Personal Mastery Intensive  that many Boston Law Of Attraction Meetup members have benefited from in becoming authentic, powerful attractors.

******************************************************

RSVP "YES" ONLY if you know you are coming. 

We provide appetizers & refreshments. So, to keep "green" & cost down, please RSVP "Yes" only when you can honor your commitment & show up. Many of you have been wonderful with this & we very much appreciate your support!

******************************************************

For parking & directions (via T or driving) info to Dave's loft : 

(1) Go here:  http://www.meetup.com/lawofattraction-us/files/

(2) Log in 

(3) Scroll down and open file "Directions & Parking_BostonLOA Meetup"

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: What is the OTHER Secret to being a Powerful Attractor of What You Want?
